summary: Beautiful just turned 18 teen follower to take with you!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][color=#00ffff]Thanks, Everyone!!!! Cookies for all!

[/color]
[url=http://funkyimg.com/view/2tXeX][img]http://funkyimg.com/i/2tXeX.png[/img][/url]

[color=#ffff00]UPDATE: Please download KSHair for now until I [/color]reup[color=#ffff00] a fixed version for hair textures.[/color]

[color=#ffff00]UPDATE: Added preview VIDEO of her. Just click on the video tab to view. [/color]

[color=#ff0000]UPDATE: Added No Tattoo Versions. [/color]
[color=#00ff00]
Years after the Dragonborn made peace with Tamriel and was looked upon as a true warrior. (Even though pickpocketing, breaking in places and murdering). Camilla decided to marry Sven and they would soon have a child they named Angie, a nickname Camilla gave her after her good friend Angeline Morrad a shop owner in Solitude. Five days before Angie's 16th birthday a tragic event happened in which Sven was murdered by a local tired of hearing the same few songs over and over. Angie couldn't take the pain of losing her father and ran away to Falkreath where she helped out at Dead Man's Drink and rented a room. Now just turning 18 she has realized that the warrior in her blood reaches out to be free and she decides to leave Falkreath with the Dragonborn to train in the ways of the Force and become a true Jedi! (Last part was for kicks :) ). [/color]
[/size][/font]

[url=http://funkyimg.com/view/2tT72][img]http://funkyimg.com/i/2tT72.jpg[/img]
